description: This course focuses on evidence-based reading and differentiation strategies that can be used across the curriculum by secondary teachers. Needs of the struggling reader and readers with special needs are addressed along with assessment, evaluation, communication, and intervention design. Required 10-hour field experience. Prerequisite: Education 290, 330 or permission of instructor. Offered both semesters.
name: Reading/Diff Instruction
notes: Open to Juniors and Seniors only.
prerequisites: Education 290, 330 or permission of instructor. Offered both semesters.

revisions.prerequisites: Prerequisite: Education 290, 330 or permission of instructor. Offered both semesters.

title: Reading and Differentiated Instruction
